phase_diagrams.name: Temperature vs. Coherence Time
phase_diagrams.cliff_edge_description: Coherence time drops below 1.0e-12 s. The simulation identifies the approximate temperature for this drop under the specified conditions.

phase_diagrams.name: System Size vs. Quantum Advantage

parameters.system_size_proxy: Barrier Width (Angstroms) for proton tunneling in DNA

phase_diagrams.cliff_edge_description: Quantum Advantage (P_tunnel / P_classical) drops below 10.0 as barrier width (system size proxy) increases. The simulation identifies the approximate barrier width for this drop at T=310.0K.
